paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on a novel KCNH2 mutation associated with congenital long QT syndrome.

patients.phenotype: syncope and persistently prolonged QTc interval

individual_records.phenotype_details: syncope and persistently prolonged QTc interval
individual_records.evidence_sentence: We report the case of a woman with syncope and persistently prolonged QTc interval.

functional_data.summary: The mutation displayed a 2‐fold reduction in protein expression and current density due to a maturation/trafficking‐deficient mechanism.

variants.additional_notes: The study emphasizes the importance of genetic analyses in congenital LQTS.
key_quotes: This study illustrates the importance of performing genetic analyses and mutation characterization when there is a suspicion of congenital LQTS.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data extracted from the main text.
